summary: Makes sneaking more difficult by reducing the effect of your sneak skill.
descriptionHtml:
Have 80 sneak and finding the game too easy?  wish it was more of a stealth game again like when you started it?  This mod is for you!



Makes sneaking more difficult by reducing the effect of your sneak skill.

(you will be required to sneak again, even at high levels of sneak) (tested for sneak skill 70)

simply changes value of fsneakskillmult from .5 to .18


remove from data folder to uninstall.



happy sneaking




be sure to check out my other game-balancing mods.
author: jmanoray
